ROUTES.SPORT: Schedule of clubs and sports sections

TEXT.PARAGRAPH: Talented teachers, high academic standards and leadership development in a blended environment are the hallmarks of an education at Semey New School.
SNS faculty are diverse and leaders in their fields - and committed to the school's mission to make a positive difference in the world.

Over the years, SNS has invested in 24-hour learning and living experiences, including an expansive new academic building and renovations to the residence halls, library, dining hall, and athletic facilities.

SNS is a leader in providing opportunities to discover new interests or dive deeper into long-held passions. Faculty, coaches, residence counselors, deans, and advisors work closely with students to guide them through their experiences.

PROFORIENTATION.TITLE: PROFORIENTATION
TEXT: Our school pays special attention to career guidance.
With our students, we analyze the types of professions and educational programs for the chosen professions.
With the help of special tests, we find out which profession is suitable for the student.
We show in which Kazakh or foreign educational institutions you can master the chosen profession.
We consider the features of each profession and help them find a job they like.

MISSION.TITLE: Mission and Values
MISSION.SUBTITLE: Strengthening Potential: Empowering Minds for a Changing World
MISSION.TEXT: Our school strives to create a dynamic learning environment where every student has the opportunity to reach their full potential by developing critical thinking, creativity and compassion to thrive in a rapidly changing world.

VALUES.TITLE: Excellence
VALUES.TEXT: Striving for the highest standards of achievement in academics, character and personal growth.

VALUES.TITLE: Inclusiveness
VALUES.TEXT: Embracing diversity and creating a welcoming environment where every individual feels valued and respected.

VALUES.TITLE: Integrity
VALUES.TEXT: Maintaining integrity, ethics, and moral principles in all actions and decisions.

VALUES.TITLE: Collaboration
VALUES.TEXT: Encouraging teamwork and collaboration among students, staff, parents, and the broader community to achieve common goals.

VALUES.TITLE: Innovation
VALUES.TEXT: Embracing creativity, curiosity, and adaptability to create a culture of continuous improvement and exploration.

VALUES.TITLE: Resilience
VALUES.TEXT: Fostering perseverance, willpower, and a positive mindset to overcome adversity and bounce back from setbacks.

VALUES.TITLE: Service
VALUES.TEXT: Fostering a spirit of giving and creating a positive impact on the local and global community through acts of kindness and service.

VALUES.TITLE: Empowerment
VALUES.TEXT: Empowering students to take ownership of their learning, make informed decisions, and become leaders.

BOARD.TITLE: Admissions Committee
BOARD.SUBTITLE: In order to enroll in Semey New School, you need to collect certain documents:
ITEMS: Grade report from the previous school (if any)
